article_title: Governor Issues Statement On Fallen Firefighter
article_text:
Pierre, SD

Governor Dennis Daugaard has released a statement regarding the Forest Service Firefighter who was killed battling California wildfires last week.

Previous Story: Veteran Firefighter Dies Battling Wildfire In California

Daugaard says, "This is a tragic loss. We are grateful for Dave Ruhl’s courage and for the many firefighters who put themselves at risk to keep us safe."

The governor will request that flags be flown at half-staff on the day of Ruhl's funeral once the date is set.

A GoFundMe page as been set up to raise money for a memorial fund.
